languages.text: Вам с трудом удается разобрать пути, обозначенные на древней карте, одиноко висящей на стене отсека. Однако большинство коридоров, что на ней отмечены, ведут в тупики, шлюзы заварены и не используются уже несколько сотен лет, а лестницы давно заменены на подъемники, ведущие в неизвестные отсеки, или вовсе отсутствуют. Спустя несколько дней скитаний вы осознаете, что вернулись в тот же отсек, с которого начали.

traits.locale_text: Вам с трудом удается разобратьпути, обозначенные на древней карте, одиноко висящей на стене отсека. Однако большинство коридоров, что на ней отмечены, ведут в тупики, шлюзы заварены и неиспользуются уже несколько сотен лет, а лестницы давно заменены на гравилифты, ведущие в неизвестные отсеки, или вовсе отсутствуют. Спустя несколько дней скитаний вы осознаете, что вернулись в тот же отсек, с которого начали.

languages.text: You struggle to make sense of the routes that were shown on the ancient map hanging forlornly on the bulkhead. Most of the passageways marked on it lead to dead ends, or the airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairwells have been replaced by lifts that go to modules unknown, while others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, you realise you still have not left the bay you started in.
languages.original_text: Вам с трудом удается разобрать пути, обозначенные на древней карте, одиноко висящей на стене отсека. Однако большинство коридоров, что на ней отмечены, ведут в тупики, шлюзы заварены и не используются уже несколько сотен лет, а лестницы давно заменены на подъемники, ведущие в неизвестные отсеки, или вовсе отсутствуют. Спустя несколько дней скитаний вы осознаете, что вернулись в тот же отсек, с которого начали.

traits.locale_text: You struggle to make out the pathways on the ancient map hanging lonesomely on the chamber wall. Most corridors marked on it are dead ends. The airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairs have long been replaced with lifts going to unknown chambers; others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, you realise you're in the same chamber you started from.

The airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairs have long been replaced with lifts going to unknown chambers; others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, you realise you're in the same chamber you started from.

The airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairs have long been replaced with lifts going to unknown chambers; others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, you realise you're in the same chamber you started from.

The Rogue Trader struggles to make sense of the routes that were shown on the ancient map hanging forlornly on the bulkhead. Most of the passageways marked on it lead to dead ends, or the airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairwells have been replaced by lifts that go to modules unknown, while others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, the Rogue Trader realises {mf|he|she} still has not left the bay {mf|he|she} started in.

The Rogue Trader struggles to make sense of the routes that were shown on the ancient map hanging forlornly on the bulkhead. Most of the passageways marked on it lead to dead ends, or the airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairwells have been replaced by lifts that go to modules unknown, while others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, the Rogue Trader realises {mf|he|she} still has not left the bay {mf|he|she} started in.

You struggle to make sense of the routes that were shown on the ancient map hanging forlornly on the bulkhead. Most of the passageways marked on it lead to dead ends, or the airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairwells have been replaced by lifts that go to modules unknown, while others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, you realise you still have not left the bay you started in.

languages.text: 你看着挂在船舱内的古老地图，努力想弄清楚前往上层甲板的路线。地图上标注的绝大多数通道已经几百年没人使用过了。这些通道要么变成了死胡同，要么气闸被焊死了。一部分楼梯间已经变成了通往未知舱室的电梯，而另一部分楼梯间则完全消失了。经过几天的徘徊之后，你发现你依然没能顺利离开最开始的甲板。
languages.original_text: You struggle to make sense of the routes that were shown on the ancient map hanging forlornly on the bulkhead. Most of the passageways marked on it lead to dead ends, or the airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairwells have been replaced by lifts that go to modules unknown, while others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, you realise you still have not left the bay you started in.

traits.locale_text: 你看着挂在船舱内的古老地图，努力想弄清楚前往上层甲板的路线。地图上标注的绝大多数通道已经几百年没人使用过了。这些通道要么变成了死胡同，要么气闸被焊死了。一部分楼梯间已经变成了通往未知舱室的电梯，而另一部分楼梯间则完全消失了。经过几天的徘徊之后，你发现你依然没能顺利离开最开始的甲板。

languages.text: No consigues descifrar las rutas del antiguo mapa que colgaba solitario en la mampara. La mayoría de los pasajes llevan a callejones sin salida y las esclusas llevan siglos selladas. Algunas escaleras se han sustituido por ascensores a módulos desconocidos, mientras que otras han desaparecido sin más. Tras días errando por los pasillos, te das cuenta de que aún no has salido de la bahía en la que despertaste.
languages.original_text: You struggle to make sense of the routes that were shown on the ancient map hanging forlornly on the bulkhead. Most of the passageways marked on it lead to dead ends, or the airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairwells have been replaced by lifts that go to modules unknown, while others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, you realise you still have not left the bay you started in.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no consigue descifrar las rutas del antiguo mapa que colgaba solitario en la mampara. La mayoría de los pasajes llevan a callejones sin salida y las esclusas llevan siglos selladas. Algunas escaleras se han sustituido por ascensores a módulos desconocidos, mientras que otras han desaparecido sin más. Tras días errando por los pasillos, se da cuenta de que aún no ha salido de la bahía en la que despertó.

languages.text: あなたは隔壁に寂しげに吊るされた古代の地図に示されたルートを理解するのに苦労している。地図に記された通路のほとんどは行き止まりになっていたり、エアロックが溶接で封鎖されていて何百年も使われていなかったりする。階段は知らないモジュールに行くエレベーターに代わっていたり、他の階段は完全に失われている。数日間歩き回った後、あなたは出発した船倉をまだ出ていないことに気がついた。
languages.original_text: You struggle to make sense of the routes that were shown on the ancient map hanging forlornly on the bulkhead. Most of the passageways marked on it lead to dead ends, or the airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairwells have been replaced by lifts that go to modules unknown, while others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, you realise you still have not left the bay you started in.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは隔壁に寂しげに吊るされた古代の地図に示されたルートを理解するのに苦労している。地図に記された通路のほとんどは行き止まりになっていたり、エアロックが溶接で封鎖されていて何百年も使われていなかったりする。階段は知らないモジュールに行くエレベーターに代わっていたり、他の階段は完全に失われている。数日間歩き回った後、ローグトレーダーは出発した船倉をまだ出ていないことに気がついた。

languages.text: Du hast Mühe, die Wege auf der uralten Karte zu finden, die einsam und vergessen am Schott hängt. Die meisten Passagen darauf enden in einer Sackgasse, oder die Luftschleusen wurden verschweißt und sind seit Jahrhunderten nicht mehr in Verwendung. Einige Treppenhäuser wurden durch Aufzüge ersetzt, die zu unbekannten Modulen führen, während andere einfach völlig fehlen. Nach einigen Tagen erkennst du, dass du das Modul, in dem du aufgebrochen bist, noch immer nicht verlassen hast.
languages.original_text: You struggle to make sense of the routes that were shown on the ancient map hanging forlornly on the bulkhead. Most of the passageways marked on it lead to dead ends, or the airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairwells have been replaced by lifts that go to modules unknown, while others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, you realise you still have not left the bay you started in.

traits.locale_text: Du hast Mühe, die Wege auf der uralten Karte zu finden, die einsam und vergessen am Schott hängt. Die meisten Passagen darauf enden in einer Sackgasse, oder die Luftschleusen wurden verschweißt und sind seit Jahrhunderten nicht mehr in Verwendung. Einige Treppenhäuser wurden durch Aufzüge ersetzt, die zu unbekannten Modulen führen, während andere einfach völlig fehlen. Nach einigen Tagen erkennst du, dass du das Modul, in dem du aufgebrochen bist, noch immer nicht verlassen hast.

{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat Mühe, die Wege auf der uralten Karte nachvollziehen, die da so einsam und vergessen am Schott hängt. Die meisten der Passagen darauf enden in einer Sackgasse, oder die Luftschleusen wurden zugeschweißt und sind seit Jahrhunderten nicht mehr in Verwendung. Einige Treppenhäuser wurden durch Aufzüge entfernt, die zu unbekannten Modulen führen, während andere einfach völlig fehlen. Nach einigen Tagen des Herumirrens wird {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} klar, dass {mf|er|sie} noch immer nicht das Modul verlassen hat, in dem {mf|er|sie} losgegangen war.

languages.text: Vous n'arrivez pas bien à déchiffrer le dédale des routes affichées sur l'ancienne carte accrochée à la cloison. La plupart des passages affichés mènent à des culs-de-sac et les sas indiqués sont fermés et sont hors service depuis des siècles. Certains escaliers ont été remplacés par des ascenseurs menant à des modules inconnus, tandis que d'autres sont tout simplement introuvables. Après quelques jours d'errance, vous vous rendez compte que vous n'avez toujours pas quitté la baie dans laquelle vous étiez au départ.
languages.original_text: You struggle to make sense of the routes that were shown on the ancient map hanging forlornly on the bulkhead. Most of the passageways marked on it lead to dead ends, or the airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairwells have been replaced by lifts that go to modules unknown, while others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, you realise you still have not left the bay you started in.

traits.locale_text: Vous n'arrivez pas bien à déchiffrer le dédale des routes affichées sur l'ancienne carte accrochée à la cloison. La plupart des passages affichés mènent à des culs-de-sac et les sas indiqués sont fermés et sont hors service depuis des siècles. Certains escaliers ont été remplacés par des ascenseurs menant à des modules inconnus, tandis que d'autres sont tout simplement introuvables. Après quelques jours d'errance, vous vous rendez compte que vous n'avez toujours pas quitté la baie dans laquelle vous étiez au départ.

languages.text: Güvertede asılı duran eski haritadaki yolları anlamakta zorlanıyorsun. Haritada işaretlenmiş geçiş yollarının çoğu ya kör noktalara çıkıyor ya da hava kilitleri ile kapatılmış, kullanılamaz hâle gelmiş ve yüzlerce yıldır kullanılmıyor. Bazı merdivenler, bilinmeyen modüllere giden asansörlerle değiştirilmişken bazıları ise tamamen kaybolmuş. Birkaç gün süren dolaşmanın ardından hâlâ başladığın bölmeden çıkamadığını fark ediyorsun.
languages.original_text: You struggle to make sense of the routes that were shown on the ancient map hanging forlornly on the bulkhead. Most of the passageways marked on it lead to dead ends, or the airlocks are welded shut and have been out of use for hundreds of years. Some stairwells have been replaced by lifts that go to modules unknown, while others are missing altogether. After a few days of wandering around, you realise you still have not left the bay you started in.
